SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS04 HS04 JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 HE01 ON (HE01.EAISVCNAME = HS04.EAISVCNAME ) WHERE HE01.EAIBZWKDSTCD IN (select EAIBZWKDSTCD from $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 where UserId=#loginId#)
UPPER(BZWKSVCKEYNAME) LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchBzwkSvcKeyName# , '%')
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIHS05 (BzwkSvcKeyName , COLUMNNAME , COLUMNVALUE ) VALUES(#bzwkSvcKeyName# , #columnName#, #columnValue#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE COLUMNVALUE = #columnValue#
